title: Print a Daily Bible Proverb to Console
text: proverbs package built one thing: print daily proverb R console. 31 proverbs, 31 days month. Many people like read proverb day month, end reading proverbs month, twelve times year. package prints chapter proverbs corresponds day month; ie. 21st June proverbs print Proverbs 21.

title: Print a Daily Bible Proverb to Console
text: main function:
code: proverbs::proverb() Proverbs 30 For Sunday, January 30 2022   1 The words of Agur the son of Jakeh; the revelation: the man says to Ithiel, to Ithiel and Ucal: 2 “Surely I am the most ignorant man, and don’t have a man’s understanding. 3 I have not learned wisdom, neither do I have the knowledge of the Holy One. ...

title: Print a Daily Bible Proverb to Console
text: can also change Bible translation one many open source/public versions. Check function: can pass translation codes proverbs::proverb() Note API key needed access ESV translation. See vignette.
code: proverbs::translations() ── Bible Translations Available ──────────── • esv: English Standard Version -requires API key • bbe: Bible in Basic English • kjv: King James Version • web: World English Bible (default) • webbe: World English Bible, British Edition • almeida: João Ferreira de Almeida (portuguese) • rccv: Romanian Corrected Cornilescu Version  ── Pass the Bible translation you choose above to proverb(), like:  proverb(translation = 'kjv') proverb(translation = 'bbe') proverbs::proverb(translation = "kjv")
